citations.narrative:
Disposition information was incomplete and unavailable for 2 adult dogs identified as #64 and #67. APHIS 7006 must be
kept up to date and accurate to meet regulatory requirements. Accurate and current records can be important for animal
health monitoring. Ensure that animals on hand and corresponding disposition forms are kept up to date and accurate at
all times
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section
